name: Infinite Chili Sauce 无尽的辣酱
name_original: Infinite Chili Sauce 无尽的辣酱
description:
This is a placement game about chili sauce
Game Features
1. Need to keep producing hot sauce and finish your own hot sauce empire
2. Easy to play, just a little bit, you can play smoothly.
3. Rich skills and promotion system, let you hang up to the old days


PS:
1. At present, the game is in the pre-emptive experience stage, and it is inevitable that there are various problems and bugs. You can send feedback directly to the community. I will keep an eye on community dynamics and fix issues in a timely manner.
2. Currently only the Chinese version. Follow-up will add English
3. The game will not add BGM. You can open the music player. Put your favorite songs. Then open the game and hang up easily and happily.
